author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J (delivering the judgment of the majority):
casename: Lee Tat Development Pte Ltd v Management Corporation of Grange Heights Strata Title No 301 (No 2)
coram: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J; Chao Hick Tin JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Tan Cheng Han SC (instructed) and Ernest Balasubramaniam (ASG Law Corporation) for the appellant; Edwin Lee and Looi Ming Ming (Rajah and Tann) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Res Judicata/Issue estoppel/Whether appellant estopped from raising issue in present action because issue forming subject matter of previous proceedings between identical parties/Requirements for establishing issue estoppel
